title: Canon PowerShot G7 X 20.2MP Compact Digital Camera Black
description: Capture stunning photos and videos with the Canon PowerShot G7 X, a high-performance compact camera ideal for both casual and enthusiast photographers. This camera offers 20.2MP resolution, f/2.8 maximum aperture for excellent low-light shots, 4.2x optical zoom, and a 3-inch LCD screen for easy control. Lightweight and travel-friendly, it features USB, Mini-USB, and HDMI connectivity, with advanced options like Auto Focus and Red-Eye Correction. Powered by a rechargeable Lithium-Ion battery. Made in Japan with Canon's trusted quality. This used item is in good working condition with minor cosmetic wear but functions flawlessly.
